name: SmugForce (Game jam version)
description:
SmugForce is a third person shooter featuring Keruru , a part of the vigilante group, Smugforce. 

So far, this is a playable sandbox demo of all the implemented gameplay mechanics.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Q - Roll

E - Melee

R - Reload

F - Pickup items ( you have to be looking at it with the cursor)

Middle mouse - grenade (hold to cook)

Left mouse - Fire

Right mouse - Aim

C - crouch

G - drink soda

Fun stuff:

Y - Free camera/spawner

f3 - SECRET cheat menu for testing

backspace - Restart level

All character models are from different sources, and are for placeholder until I make an actual one.

Music from Copyright Free EDM
